whatIsNetflix.question: What is diStreaming?
whatIsNetflix.answer: diStreaming is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries, and more on thousands of internet-connected devices. You can watch as much as you want, whenever you want, without a single ad – all for one low monthly price.

howMuch.question: How much does diStreaming cost?
howMuch.answer: Watch diStreaming on your smartphone, tablet, Smart TV, laptop, or streaming device, all for one fixed monthly fee. Plans range from IDR 54,000 to IDR 186,000 a month. No extra costs, no contracts.

whereWatch.question: Where can I watch?
whereWatch.answer: Watch anywhere, anytime. Sign in with your diStreaming account to watch instantly on the web at diStreaming.com from your personal computer or on any internet-connected device that offers the diStreaming app, including smart TVs, smartphones, tablets, streaming media players, and game consoles.

howCancel.question: How do I cancel?
howCancel.answer: diStreaming is flexible. There are no annoying contracts and no commitments. You can easily cancel your account online in two clicks. There are no cancellation fees – start or stop your account anytime.

whatWatch.question: What can I watch on diStreaming?
whatWatch.answer: diStreaming has an extensive library of feature films, documentaries, TV shows, anime, award-winning diStreaming originals, and more. Watch as much as you want, anytime you want.

goodForKids.question: Is diStreaming good for kids?
goodForKids.answer: The diStreaming Kids experience is included in your membership to give parents control while kids enjoy family-friendly TV shows and movies in their own space.
